title: Two Sum
description: Given an array of integers, return indices of the two numbers such that they add up to a specific target.

title: Balanced Parentheses
description: Check if a string containing only parentheses is balanced.

title: Longest Increasing Subsequence
description: Find the length of the longest increasing subsequence in an array.

title: Graph Cycle Detection
description: Detect a cycle in a directed graph using DFS.

title: Median of Two Sorted Arrays
description: Find the median of two sorted arrays of size m and n.
